description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Cable Beach, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Blissful Broome Oaks Escape near Famous Cable Beach
hotels.description: Stay within moments of Broome's most iconic beach at Oaks Cable Beach Resort, a mere 15-minute walk to the famous white sands and sunsets of Cable Beach. The resort's facilities are geared towards ensuring guests' ultimate comfort: cool off at four swimming pools and one kids' pool, and feast on modern Australian fare in between sips of an ice-cold beer at the breezy Cables Restaurant & Bar. The resort is located at the gateway to Western Australia's Kimberley region, so you can enjoy easy access to some of the country's most awe-inspiring natural wonders.

seo.title: Hoteles en Cable Beach - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Cable Beach, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
